channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
I get this when i run Deception client
Deception java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\DC\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.java:106) at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.java:66) at java.io.FileReader.(FileReader.java:41) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:67) at client.startUp(client.java:8128) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5580) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol: www.branscape.info/DC.zip at java.net.URL.(URL.java:567) at java.net.URL.(URL.java:464) at java.net.URL.(URL.java:413) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:99) at Update.(Update.java:27) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4324) at client.startUp(client.java:8138) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5580) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) error
